## Why this Course?
- This course builds on basic Pandas knowledge
- Learn advanced techniques for complex data wrangling tasks
- Gain skills to handle messy, real-world datasets efficiently
- Explore best practices for data cleaning and transformation

## Why Advanced Wrangling?

- Real-world data is often dirty, inconsistent, and complex
- Basic techniques are not enough for challenging datasets
- Advanced skills enable faster, more robust data preparation
- Better data quality leads to more accurate insights and decisions

## Course Objectives:

- Master advanced indexing and selection techniques
- Perform complex data transformations and reshaping
- Handle missing data and data cleaning challenges
- Combine and merge datasets from multiple sources
- Leverage Pandas' performance optimization methods
- Explore data wrangling best practices and case studies
